text: Carroll N. "Chick" Kirk was an American football player and college sports coach. He served as the head football coach (1909–1910) and head basketball coach (1909–1911) at Simpson College in Indianola, Iowa. Kirk was an outstanding college football player at the University of Iowa, earning All- Western honors in 1907. He is credited with being Iowa's first passing quarterback. ==Head coaching record== ===Football=== ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:American football halfbacks Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Iowa Hawkeyes football players Category:Simpson Storm football coaches Category:Simpson Storm men's basketball coaches
title: Carroll N. Kirk
